content:
I cannot have personal opinions or preferences since i have no consciousness or emotions. however, some movies that are known for their exceptional cinematography include:
- blade runner (1982)
- the shining (1980)
- lawrence of arabia (1962)
- the grand budapest hotel (2014)
- children of men (2006)
- roma (2018)
- the revenant (2015)
- dunkirk (2017)
- avatar (2009)
- the godfather (1972) 

all of these movies show an impressive use of color, lighting, framing and camera movement, and contribute to the story's emotional impact, visual beauty, and overall cinematic experience.
